setting.primary_location: 47 human colony systems spread across 18-40 light-years from Earth
setting.atmosphere: Isolation despite connection - colonies can talk instantly but never visit, cultural divergence creating alien human subspecies, paranoia over information control
key_locations: New Singapore - major ansible hub colony
The Relay - massive ansible station in interstellar space
Earth (Sol System) - the origin, now silent
Tau Ceti Yards - where relativistic trade ships are built

ansible_technology.mechanism: Quantum entanglement communication - instantaneous across any distance
ansible_technology.energy_requirement: Massive power requirements limit message frequency and length
ansible_technology.operator_requirement: Requires trained human operators to encode/decode quantum states
ansible_technology.monopoly: Ansible guild controls all ansible stations, only they can send/receive messages
ansible_technology.vulnerability: Any ansible that broadcasts can be traced by sufficiently advanced civilizations

physical_travel.maximum_speed: 0.3c (30% speed of light) via fusion torch ships
physical_travel.time_dilation: Significant but not extreme at 0.3c - 20 years objective = ~18 years subjective
physical_travel.economic_impact: Physical goods rarely traded, blueprints and data transmitted instead
physical_travel.relativistic_clans: Communities of traders who spend most of their lives in transit

information_control.ansible_guild_monopoly: Only guild operators can send messages, creating information bottleneck
information_control.verification_problem: No way to verify message authenticity except light-speed physical confirmation
information_control.light_delay_confirmation: Physical evidence takes decades to arrive, by then ansible 'truth' is established
information_control.message_modification: Operators can delay, alter, or fabricate messages without detection
information_control.historical_fabrication: Present-time history can be written and rewritten in real-time

cultural_drift.divergence_rate: Approximately 0.8% cultural change per decade from Earth baseline
cultural_drift.by_2880: Colonies have diverged 40+ years from each other, nearly mutually incomprehensible worldviews
cultural_drift.common_elements: Earth Memory organization works to maintain shared cultural touchstones
cultural_drift.language_drift: Dialects emerging, some colonies barely comprehensible to others
cultural_drift.speciation_timeline: Current models predict separate human species in 10,000 years without travel

technology_level.no_strong_ai: Narrow AI common, but no general intelligence

social_structures.colonial_charters: Each colony has unique government structure based on founding corporation/nation
social_structures.ansible_guild: Techno-religious organization controlling all FTL communication
social_structures.earth_memory: Organization dedicated to preserving common human cultural baseline
social_structures.memory_factions: Post-reveal groups wanting to preserve humanity independent from aliens

timeline_relativity.present_time_problem: Each colony's 'present' is different based on light-delay from Earth
timeline_relativity.ansible_creates_consensus: Ansible allows colonies to synchronize on shared 'now'
timeline_relativity.when_earth_dies: Different colonies learn at different times based on ansible message timing

themes: Truth as commodity controlled by gatekeepers - information monopoly as ultimate power
Cultural drift and the loss of common humanity - how long can we remain 'human' together?
Information vs. physical presence - the difference between knowing and experiencing
tone: Paranoid espionage thriller meets philosophical space opera, intimate character moments across impossible distances, growing horror of isolation masquerading as connection, beauty and tragedy of human diversification

the_great_secret.earth_silence: Earth's ansible went silent 40 years before trilogy begins
the_great_secret.guild_fabrication: Ansible guild has been fabricating Earth's messages to prevent civilization collapse
the_great_secret.true_reason: Earth made contact with aliens who use FTL travel, attempted to share ansible tech
the_great_secret.alien_quarantine: Earth was forcibly isolated by aliens to prevent ansible spread
the_great_secret.earth_sacrifice: Earth detonated their ansible to prevent Harvesters from tracing signal to colonies
the_great_secret.harvester_threat: Von Neumann probes that destroy any civilization using ansible technology
the_great_secret.current_danger: Colonial ansible network has been broadcasting for 40 years, Harvesters are 3 years away

trilogy_arc.book_1: Lira discovers ansible message discrepancies, uncovers guild manipulation, reveals Earth has been silent for 40 years
trilogy_arc.book_2: Colonies fracture over truth vs. fabrication, alien contact revelation, Earth's sacrifice discovered
trilogy_arc.book_3: Harvester arrival, choice between ansible unity or isolated survival, Lira broadcasts truth then destroys ansible network
